actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 21 of title 44 to authorize the offering of restricted records to the National Archives under certain conditions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the head of any Federal agency to offer records under his control for acceptance for deposit with the National Archives in accordance with the restrictions any such agency head imposes upon such records.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 21 of title 44 to authorize the offering of restricted records to the National Archives under certain conditions, and for other purposes.
